original_text: Since those days were, when one came to an heap of twenty measures, there were but ten: when one came to the pressfat for to draw out fifty vessels out of the press, there were but twenty.
korean_text: 그 때에는 이십 고르 곡식 더미에 이른즉 십 고르뿐이었고 포도즙 틀에 오십 고르를 길으러 이른즉 이십 고르뿐이었었느니라

sentences.original_text: when one came to an heap of twenty measures,
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 스무 이마의 양더미에 이르렀을 때에,

sentences.original_text: for to draw out fifty vessels out of the press,
